TopicTitle: [0.23] Squad Texture Reduction Pack - B9 and KW Packs also

Articles.Content:
Oafman, indeed, this mod simply fiddles with the textures for the parts for squad's own, B9's, and KW's parts pack. However this is a dead thread, the owner has abandoned it, and probably KSP all together. If you are using Better Atmospheres, by Thesonicgalaxy (mandatory otherwise jealousy rage comes your way), you can download his texture reduction pack for his mod, however the RAM reduction takes computing power, so the reduction pack will take a big bite out of your FPS if you are already suffering low frame rates.

I would suggest getting rid of parts you never use, there are always loads you think, "wow, I have never used this part ever and probably never will".

Sam
Oafman: you are correct. This should make you crash less.

I have the files (without the flags) from my GameData folder that I am using with the mod already applied. I don't have the mod itself but this is the end result:

http://goo.gl/ew5u0r

Hope I helped!

P.S. If someone has the original mod, could you please share a link to it?

Dead as it may be i still have two of redux ZIP files in my Archive. I sadly do not have the KW verson.

hy Guys,

someone has a Link for KW Rocketry reduced Textures please ?

thx in advance
KW Rocketry was updated to v.2.6, so whatever links the people here give you, will not be relevant to the current version of KWR, and are more than likely to mess the whole pack up.

KW Rocketry was updated to v.2.6, so whatever links the people here give you, will not be relevant to the current version of KWR, and are more than likely to mess the whole pack up.

Not only that -- the folder structure was reorganized so you'd be adding additional textures instead of replacing them.

If anyone is still having memory problems, install Active Texture Management.

Why not use active texture manager?
I can't find the downloads for these...

I can't find the downloads for these...

Not sure if you are allowed to link other websites downloads in the forum but if you google- 'KW Rocketry Texture Reduction Pack' there is a download on the the top search.

It seems any time the download is from Curseforge the link takes you to the home page.

Any link you find for either the Squad or KW pack are going to be out date. Squad will fair better, but KW went through a massive folder structure reorg. Installing either "reduction" pack could very well increase your memory usage instead of decreasing it.

I can't find the downloads for these...

Same.

Same.

First necro'ing threads is generally not a good idea. Second, read my post immediately above yours. Squad's also renamed many textures; any texture reduction pack will either not work or will increase your memory load.

Install Active Texture Management. It'll save you far more memory than what was possible with PolecatEZ's reduction pack.
